attributes.action: Work to reach agreement on a financial package for the N.Ireland Power Sharing Executive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to work with the Chancellor of the Exchequer and the political parties in Northern Ireland to reach agreement on a financial package for the new  power-sharing Executive.

We believe that this will ensure that the new devolved administration is able to make an immediate and positive impact on the lives of the people of Northern Ireland.

We believe that the provision of a generous financial package will help the politicians of Northern Ireland in their efforts to overcome the problems of the past and provide a  more prosperous and peaceful shared future for all the people of Northern Ireland.
